sources.name: source1
sources.script:
source(output(
		
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionBy('external', 0)) ~> source1

sinks.name: sink1
sinks.script:
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string,
		Column_9 as string,
		Column_10 as string,
		Column_11 as string,
		Column_12 as string,
		Column_13 as string,
		Column_14 as string,
		Column_15 as string,
		Column_16 as string,
		Column_17 as string,
		Column_18 as string,
		Column_19 as string,
		Column_20 as string,
		Column_21 as string,
		Column_22 as string,
		Column_23 as string,
		Column_24 as string,
		Column_25 as string,
		Column_26 as string,
		Column_27 as string,
		Column_28 as string,
		Column_29 as string,
		Column_30 as string,
		Column_31 as string,
		Column_32 as string,
		Column_33 as string,
		Column_34 as string,
		Column_35 as string,
		Column_36 as string,
		Column_37 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn:'undefined',
	truncate:true) ~> sink1

transformations.name: Exists1
transformations.script:
source1 exists(ERROR_FUNCTION('') == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'none')~> Exists1
